title: Lipotropic Complex | Integrative Therapeutics®
description: Lipotropic Complex provides comprehensive transmethylation support for the liver by combining phytonutrients and bile salts.*
cleaned_text: in](/account?locale=en) [View full details](/products/lipotropic-complex) Product information PROVIDES COMPREHENSIVE TRANSMETHYLATION SUPPORT FOR THE LIVER* Lipotropic Complex provides comprehensive transmethylation support for the liver by combining phytonutrients and bile salts.* WITH SUPPORTIVE INGREDIENTS Choline, methionine, and silymarin from thistle act hepatic transmethylation reactions.* Vitamins B6, B12, and folate for these conversions.* In addition, Lipotropic Complex contains botanicals, such as dandelion, fringe tree, beet, and radish, as well as ox bile and inositol. PROVIDES COMPREHENSIVE TRANSMETHYLATION SUPPORT FOR THE LIVER* Lipotropic Complex provides comprehensive transmethylation support for the liver by combining phytonutrients and bile salts.* WITH SUPPORTIVE INGREDIENTS Choline, methionine, and silymarin from thistle act hepatic transmethylation reactions.* Vitamins B6, B12, and folate for these conversions.* In addition, Lipotropic Complex contains botanicals, such as dandelion, fringe tree, beet, and radish, as well as ox bile and inositol. INGREDIENTS 5 Calories <1g Total Ox Bile ** Daily Value (DV) not established Percent daily value is based on a 2000 calorie diet Other Ingredients Lipotropic Complex Does Not Contain Gluten Soy Dairy Colors Artificial Flavors Wheat Other Details Quatrefolic® is a registered trademark of Gnosis S.p.A. 7,947,662. Lipotropic Complex Directions and/or DosageAdults take 1 or 2 capsules two times daily with meals, or as recommended by a healthcare professional. WarningDo not use if you are pregnant or nursing. Individuals with allergies to plants of the Asteraceae (Compositae) family, including ragweed, should use this product with caution. If you are taking prescription drugs, consult a healthcare professional before use. Keep out of reach of children. Safety sealed with inner seal. Do not use if seal is broken or missing. Keep tightly closed. Store at room temperature. Avoid excessive heat and direct sunlight. INTERACTIONS FAQS A: The fringe tree is small tree with white flowers that is native to the eastern United States. The bark of the fringe tree helps increase the production of bile and supports healthy fluid balance and acts as a gentle laxative.
